imdb.title: Kaiba
imdb.plot: In a futuristic dystopian world where memories are literally stored, bought and sold and rich have all the privileges, a young amnesiac is trying to find out who he is.

episodes.title: The Name Is Warp
episodes.plot: A boy wakes up without memories, and a hole in his chest. His only belonging is a blurry picture of a girl. He's suddenly picked up by a creature, and chased by strange machines. He makes it to a place with other people, and soon a man named Popo greets and shows him around. The boy is taken to the land above, and is told by Popo that his name is Warp. He gets on a ship, and is taken away.

episodes.title: Stowaways
episodes.plot: Onboard the freight ship to Tehaisa, Kaiba is now a stowaway amongst the packages, when he gets acquainted with another stowaway named Kochu and her boyfriend Butter. Later on planet Lala one of the memory tanks explodes, causing the memories of 200,000 people to leak into the sky and the suspect is the same person in Kaiba's locket.

episodes.title: Chroniko's Boots
episodes.plot: After escaping the freight ship, Kaiba and his companion crash land onto a nearby planet and just when they are about to be discovered a young girl named Chroniko helps them. Chroniko tells Kaiba about how she is planning to sell her body to help her family, but the next day, something unexpected happens during the procedure. Kaiba later learns of the truth about Chroniko's family situation.

episodes.title: The Crone's Memory Room
episodes.plot: On a strange small planet, Kaiba is in Chroniko's body, being followed by Vanilla. After losing Vanilla, in the hippo body, Kaiba is then drag off by some Grandma who fixes the scar on his hippo body. But soon some trouble arises and Kaiba is then forced to go inside Grandma's memories to look for the treasure.

episodes.title: Abipa, the Utopian Planet
episodes.plot: Kaiba is now on a rich planet known as Abipa and subsequent to some unforeseen circumstances; his cheap hippo body is taken to a junk factory. On his way to get his body back, Kaiba learns about the famous body designer 'Patch' and his pet dog 'Quilt'.

episodes.title: A Muscular Woman
episodes.plot: The freight ship Kaiba and Vanilla are on is headed to a planet, named Lolo, where the memories of the living and the dead tend to collect at the largest memory tank. Whilst landing, the freight ship collides with another smaller ship. Kaiba is worried and investigate the crash site, to find an old couple receiving some help, from a strange woman in a man's body.

episodes.title: The Man Who Doesn't Stay in Memories
episodes.plot: Kaiba and Vanilla find themselves on the weird underwater planet Nene and they later go to check out the moon. It isn't long before Vanilla finds out that they are wanted, for being involved, in the explosion on Lolo. Later on Kaiba looks into the memories of Gel, which he copied and it is then he discovers that Gel is Neiro and is also responsible for the explosions.

episodes.title: Disguise
episodes.plot: We get some insight into the goings on of the notorious Issoudan group and how Popo is related to it. It's also revealed what Warp, the king of memories, is and also that the current Warp on the throne is nothing but a fake.

episodes.title: Attack Warp!
episodes.plot: Popo is now aware that the Warp in the heavens is a fake and decides to take this as an opportunity to form an uprising, with Neiro leading the charge. Kaiba has return to his original Warp body, so Popo gets Neiro to try and kill him, but she begins to question her memories of hate towards Warp.

episodes.title: Kaiba
episodes.plot: Neiro regains her true memories of Warp/Kaiba and what really happened between them, is revealed.

episodes.title: Revolving Fan
episodes.plot: After defeating Warp, Popo is now elated that his dream is finally coming true and he doesn't allow such things like the electrolytic clouds or skonk faze him. However he no longer has anyone to share this moment with, neither his Mom nor Cheki. Elsewhere it seems Kaiba has survived and even regained his memories.

episodes.title: Everyone in the Clouds
episodes.plot: Kaiba faces off against Warp. Kichi and Hyo Hyo turn off the fans. Kaiba easily defeats Warp, and another Warp is born. Neiro tries to talk to Kaiba, but he dismisses her, wanting everyone to get eaten by the massive Kaiba plant. Neiro ultimately succeeds, and the electrolytic cloud defeats the massive Kaiba plant. Everyone's safe, but without memories. All ends with the still remembering Hyo Hyo returning Kichi to his original body.
